Package chessapi4j

Class Bitboard

  • java.lang.Object
    • chessapi4j.Bitboard
  • public class Bitboard
extends Object
    Wrapped bitboard class for some debugging or experimenting purposes. I don't recommend use it in high performance related functionality.

    This class is not thread safe.

    Since:
    1.2.3
    Author:
    lunalobos

      • trailingZeros

        public int trailingZeros()
        Returns the number of trailing zeros in the bitboard.

        This is useful for quickly getting the index of the least significant bit set to 1 in the bitboard.

        For example, if the bitboard is 0b1100000, then the least significant bit set to 1 is the 5th bit (index 5), so this method will return 5.

        This method is equivalent to Long.numberOfTrailingZeros(long).

        Returns:
        the number of trailing zeros
        Since:
        1.2.9
